ballot.to_get_started: To get started, please provide your name.
ballot.alert_msg: Please provide a first name and last name that consists of 2 or more letters, spaces and hyphens.

ballot_form.your_ballot_marking: to begin your ballot marking process.

access_code.tm_ev: your Access code valid but expired
access_code.alert_msg: Enter an Access code that is exactly 5 numbers.
access_code.text_ac: Enter the code sent to your email below. The code expires in _ minutes.

beforeyoufinish_page.beforeyoufinish: Your ballot is being digitally sealed.
beforeyoufinish_page.para: Before you submit your ballot, you can perform a check to make sure it is recorded and sealed correctly. How? It's easy.
beforeyoufinish_page.para_center: 1. Use a laptop or other device if you have one. If you don't have a second device, open the browser app on this device.
beforeyoufinish_page.link: Want to learn more about ballot checking? Visit electionwebsite.gov.

ballot_fingerp.ydn: To check your ballot, go to VerifyMyBallot.gov and enter the Ballot Checking Code displayed above. After you enter the code, tap the Code Entered button below.
ballot_fingerp.tv3_fb: For more information on testing, click the link below.
ballot_fingerp.tv_fp: Or, you can cast your ballot digitally now.
ballot_fingerp.tv1_fp: On a computer or other device,go to
ballot_fingerp.tv2_fb: and enter  the  following code to review your ballot

copy_confirm.yccm: Your code has been copied to memory.
copy_confirm.yccm2: Go to your test site, paste your code, get your result and return.

test_result_page.ydn: Your ballot was unsealed and is now displayed on the VerifyMyBallot site. Review to confirm your choices are all correct.
test_result_page.tv2_fb: If you did first use a Verify  My Ballot site, before you  selected
test_result_page.tv2_fb1: then you should re-try the  test using the Re-Try option below.

ballot_resealed_page.ydn: Your ballot is being digitally sealed again. You can perform the check again or submit your ballot.

code_invalid_access00004_error.auth_p_1: Sorry, your access code did not work. Please try again, or click the link below for help.
code_invalid_access00004_error.auth_p_2: You can also click the print button below to proceed with a physical return instead.

ballot_test_faild_test_page.first_para: Sorry to hear that. Your  ballot will be discarded.
ballot_test_faild_test_page.sec_para: Would you like to mark a new ballot or request a ballot be mailed to you?

new_ballot_finger_print.heading: Your Ballot Is Ready
new_ballot_finger_print.text: You can send it digitally now.
new_ballot_finger_print.text_detail: Or if you like, you may perform a technical test to verify your ballot fingerprint. To do so, copy the ballot fingerprint below, and paste into your external validator of choice.

check_server_page.text: Sorry, it seems we are have some network connection issues on our end. Please try again.
check_server_page.text1: If the issue persists, please click the link below to check the status of our servers.
check_server_page.text2: We are sorry for the inconvenience!

check_network_oooo_error_page.text: Sorry, it seems there was a network error. Please check your connection and try again.
check_network_oooo_error_page.first_para: Sorry, it seems there was a network error. Please check your connection and try again.
check_network_oooo_error_page.sec_para: You can also click the print button below to proceed with a physical return instead.

sending_confirmation_page.heading: Congrats! Your ballot has been sent!
sending_confirmation_page.para_center: To track your ballot and confirm it was received, visit electionwebsite.gov and enter the Ballot Tracking Code displayed below.

howitdo_page.heading: How'd it Go?
howitdo_page.para: Please tell us how your experience was, using the Markit App.
howitdo_page.para_center: Your feedback is greatly appreciated and will help us further improve the voting experience in MarkIt. Tap the link below to complete a brief survey.
howitdo_page.heading_link: Follow the link below to let us know!

rap_page.para: To use digital return, touch  Next to request a one-time access code to be sent to your email address.
rap_page.para_center: If you did not receive a code upon requesting, please check the email we have on file by following the link below.

ballotpreperror.upr_para: Something went wrong, and we can't complete the preparation of your digital ballot.
ballotpreperror.mid_para: You can report a problem, and you have the option of using the Print button below to print your ballot and affidavit for physical return.

ballotballotpreperror.upr_para: Something went wrong, and we can't complete the preparation of your digital ballot.
ballotballotpreperror.mid_para: You can report a problem, and you have the option of using the Print button below to print your ballot and affidavit for physical return.

digital_return_next_step_page.textD: Congrats on finishing your ballot! There are still a few more important steps that you need to complete. Please click the link below to begin.

tobe_continue_page.ty_ta: Thank you for testing the app!
tobe_continue_page.detail: You have reached the end of the app's current development. Reset to begin a new test.

printing_page.ydp: Your Documents have been sent to your printer.
printing_page.dt: Please check that both your absentee ballot and voter statement documents have printed successfully, before using the

user_time_out_page.d_text: Sorry, it seems you have been inactive for too long. Please go back and start a new ballot.
user_time_out_page.d_text1: For more information on this, please follow the link below.

ballot_test_failed_page.upr_para: Sorry to hear that. We do not recommend you use this voting app. You can report a problem and contact your election administrator for additional options.

voter_record_notfound00000_error.first_para: Something went wrong,and we can't send the access code required to finish your digital ballot.
voter_record_notfound00000_error.sec_para: You can report a problem, and you have the option of using the Print button below to print your ballot and affidavit for physical return.

check_network_request00001_error.text: Sorry, it seems there was a network error. Please check your connection and try again.
check_network_request00001_error.first_para: Sorry, it seems there was a network error. Please check your connection and try again.
check_network_request00001_error.sec_para: You can also click the print button below to proceed with a physical return instead.

calloutoforder_access00002_error.sec_para: You can report a problem, and you have the option of using the Print button below to print your ballot and affidavit for physical return.

code_expired_access00003_error.upr_para: Sorry, your access code has expired. Please request another access code. Or click the link below for help.
code_expired_access00003_error.sec_para: You can also click the print button below to proceed with a physical return instead.

check_network_access00005_error.sec_para: You can also click the print button below to proceed with a physical return instead.

calloutoforder_construct00006_error.upr_para: Something went wrong. You will not be able to submit your ballot digitally at this time.
calloutoforder_construct00006_error.mid_para: You can report a problem and use the Print button below to print your ballot for physical return.

check_network_construct00007_error.text: Sorry, it seems there was a network error. Please check your connection and try again.

check_network_construct00007_error.sec_para: You can report a problem, and you can print your ballot and use physical return by tapping the print button below.

corrupt_cv_construct00008_error.upr_para: Your local election office has been notified to issue you a replacement ballot by mail. For more information, you may contact your election office through the link below.
